name: Ball2Box
description:
Can you get all three stars in all levels? Swipe to toss the ball and hit the box in over 100 levels. Only one finger needed so it's the perfect game for school or other boring tasks during your day. Like basketball but with one finger! Get it now and start dunking.

Created with Godot Engine version 3.5.2

This game is Open Source on Github!

This is my first game published on itch.io and more games are coming soon.
